Nightstrike::

Nightstrike said to Megatron "If you let us, Megatron we have to 
train to the championship"

and he followed Firestrike.
--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Firestrike finally smiled, then turned and walked beckonuing for 
> Nightstrike to follow.  In deep thought he pondered. "I msut find 
out 
> about this one on Cybertron, there must be a connection."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > Megatron's one eye zoomed in then out, making a whirling noise. 
His
> > shredded face gave away views of deep thought. "It is our 
destiny." 
> he
> > whispered. "Yes, you sound very much like someone from Cybertron 
a 
> long
> > time ago, he gave a quote very close to yours." Megatron notted, 
> highly
> > amused by that fact.
